    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public abstract void allocate(java.util.List<BaseDistItem> distItems,
            AllocationPool amountToPay)
        Prefill the amount on the dist items up to the given amount
        Parameters:
        distItems - to distribute to
        amountToPay - - the amount to distribute to the items

      • checkDistItemIsOnSamePayment

        protected void checkDistItemIsOnSamePayment(BaseDistItem distItemToCheck,
                                BaseDist targetDist)
        All dist items supplied to prefill must be on the same BaseDist. This method should be called on every dist item as we are prefilling them in order to ensure this requirement.
        Parameters:
        distItemToCheck - The item to check if it is on the same payment as the rest of the items
        targetDist - the base dist off of one of the items supplied to prefill
